source.name: Per Capita Electricity Consumption: Line Chart
source.description: The Governor's strategic goal on energy consumption is to reduce per capita electricity consumption in Maryland by 15% by 2015.  This includes reducing demand during times of peak electricity use (peak demand). This chart shows progress we have made reducing per capita electricity consumption, as well as our yearly targets.
